template.name: BVS Portal: FF Progress Bar

li.t-attf-class: li_main_step {{ 'active' if i[0] == 'overview' else ''}} li_{{ i[0] }}

template.name: BVS Portal: FF GS Welcome

div.p: Welcome back to your Fact Find profile. We’re going to ask you questions about yourself, your financial situation, the home you’d like to buy, and what you’d like your new mortgage to look like.
Once you’ve answered these questions, we’ll provide you with a personalized mortgage recommendation approved by one of our professional mortgage advisers.
Use the button below to continue, or use the menu above to navigate to a specific section.

div.div: Stage :

button.class: btn btn-md btn-dark mt-3 mb-3 btn-continue-ff

template.name: BVS Portal: FF AY Personal Details

div.p: For this section you'll need

ul.li: Address Details (for the last three years)

div.p: If you don’t have this documentation to hand, you can always save your progress and come back later to confirm your details.

We now need to confirm a few details about your financial situation, homes that you own, and your personal details. It'll be useful to have any relevant documentation to hand, such as bank statements and loan agreements.

div.div: Stage :

div.label: Date of Name Change
div.div: Please enter a valid Date Of Name Change.

div.label: Date of Birth
div.div: Please enter a valid Date Of Birth.
Passport expired.

div.label: When did you start/continue living in the UK?
Do you hold Indefinite Leave to Remain (ILR)?
Email *
div.div: Please enter a valid Email Address.

div.label: Mobile Number *
div.div: Please enter a valid 11-digit mobile number.

div.label: Home Telephone
div.div: Please enter a valid 11-digit Telephone number.

button.class: btn btn-md btn-dark mt-3 mb-3 personal-details-save btn-submit

Are you sure you want to delete this dependant?

div.label: Date of Birth

div.label: Please clarify why the child care cost is zero or low *
Additional costs for financial dependants aged 18 and above *

button.class: btn btn-md btn-dark mt-3 mb-3 btn-next

template.name: BVS Portal: FF YF General Employment

div.p: You will need

ul.li: Details of your last 3 years of employment
Proof of income. Depending on the nature of your employment, this could be your Payslips, your annual tax calculations or your company accounts.
Details of any employment benefits you receive. Typically, these can be found in your employment contract.

div.label: NI Number *
div.div: Please enter a valid NI number.

div.label: Do you anticipate your employment changing in the near future?

button.class: btn btn-md btn-dark mt-3 mb-3 btn-next

template.name: BVS Portal: FF YF Current Employment

div.p: You will need

ul.li: Details of your last 3 years of employment
Proof of income. Depending on the nature of your employment, this could be your Payslips, your annual tax calculations or your company accounts.
Details of any employment benefits you receive. Typically, these can be found in your employment contract.

div.label: NI Number *
div.div: Please enter a valid NI number.

div.label: Anticipated Retirement Age *
div.div: The anticipated retirement age must be between 50 and 80 years.

div.label: Work Telephone
div.div: Please enter a valid 11-digit work telephone number.

div.label: Start Date *
div.div: Please enter a valid start date.

div.label: Years of Experience in Contract Basis *
Do you have any deductions in your payslip? *
Gross Monthly Retirement Income: *

div.div: Success! Retirement income saved successfully!

Have you ever been in a debt management plan? *
Have you ever had any default registered against you or your business? *
Have you ever failed to keep up mortgage and second charge repayments? *

template.name: BVS Portal: FF YEP Your Mortgages

div.p: It may be useful to have your existing mortgage policy documents to hand.
Some of the data captured on this page may have been sourced from Experian.

select.name: ownership_of_deed
select.option: Only by client or with someone else

button.class: btn btn-md btn-dark mt-3 mb-3 btn-next

template.name: BVS Portal: FF YNM Mortgage

div.p: You will need

ul.li: Details of the loan amount you wish to raise
Details of the property you are looking to arrange a mortgage for

div.label: Are you using this mortgage to consolidate debt?
Choose one of the following that most closely describes your preference:
I want certainty that my mortgage will be repaid in full at the end of the term
I am prepared to repay the entire capital amount at the end of the mortgage term
I am prepared to repay a part of the capital amount at the end of the mortgage term
Is stability of payments important to you?
Are you prepared to accept the risk that interest rates could go up, meaning that your payments will increase and could exceed your available budget?
Do you want to fix your mortgage costs for a certain period? If so, how long?
Do you require an upper limit on your mortgage costs for a specific reason?
Do you require a savings account linked to the mortgage?
Do you have a preferred mortgage term?
Would you like to reduce the mortgage term if it is within budget?
Are you prepared to take a longer mortgage term in return for lower monthly payments?
Do you have any plans to pay off some or your entire mortgage before the end of the full mortgage term?
Paying mortgage arrangement fees up front
Adding the fees to my loan and paying additional interest on it over time

Are there any other features that would be important to you? E.g. Cashback, free legal fees, speed of completion, free valuation, no arrangement fee. Please keep in mind that these features may impact the product choices available.
Do you think that your income is likely to change significantly within the next 5 years?
Do you think that your expenditure is likely to change significantly within the next 5 years?
Are you likely to move home in the foreseeable future?
If yes, what are your sources of income?
Is there anything else that would be important to you?

button.class: btn btn-md btn-dark mt-3 mb-3 btn-next

template.name: BVS Portal: FF YNM Banking

div.p: Please let us know the bank account details for your direct debits to pay for the mortgage you're taking out.

div.label: Account Opened Date
div.div: Please Enter Valid Account Date.

button.class: btn btn-md btn-dark mt-3 mb-3 btn-next

div.label: Is this a new build property? *

No of stories in the building
How many flats are on the same floor?
Is the flat situated above a commercial property?
Is this property in Shared Ownership Scheme?
Do you have help to buy loan for this property?
How many occupants in this property?
Do you want to borrow any additional amount from this mortgage?

template.name: BVS Portal: FF YPP Your Health Information

div.p: We might need to know your health information if you want advice on a new insurance policy.

div.label: Do you have any existing employer sick pay benefit?
How many months can you claim?
How long have you been registered with a UK GP?
Do you have a valid will?
Are you smoking?(Smoking/ Tobacco/ Nicotine products)

select.name: smoking
select.option: No, I have never smoked or used e-cigarettes
Yes, I do smoking (on special occasions/ regularly)

div.label: How many cigarettes are you using (weekly)?
Please comment on your alcohol consumption(glass Per Week)

select.name: alcohol_consumption_comment
select.option: Yes, I do drinking (on special occasions/ regularly)

div.label: How many glasses of alcohol do you typically consume per week?

button.class: btn btn-md btn-dark mt-3 mb-3 btn-submit
